constantValues: A Docket is used to group inquiries (LOIs) and/or requests with a specific grant/award cycle or date (usually a review/board meeting).

definitions.description: A Docket is used to group inquiries (LOIs) and/or requests with a specific grant/award cycle or date (usually a review/board meeting).
